Literal free money and my credit score has been soaring. Fuck wish id done this a decade ago.

Mormons and other religions do this shit too.

>"No gambling EVER! You are not even allowed to look at a deck of cards!"
>"No drinking ever!!!'

And a rational person could say "oh yes but I'm just going to have this deck of cards to amuse myself when friends come over with no real money. Oh I'm just going to have a nice glass of wine with my steak" and stick to it. But a good chunk of the population are fucking retards and so telling them absolutely not even a drop of booze or else Jesus will cry is good advice, given the number of people who end up dead or killing people or fucking shit up because they're alcoholics.

Tldr; read all of those instructions you don't like as "hey retards,..." And then it'll make sense and you won't complain
